name: Secret Santa Fish Game
description:
Submission for Secret Santa Jam. 

Here is the message Berfin wrote to me.

"Hello, I am studying at Berfin Yaşar University, Department of New Media and Communication. The things I like are fish and therefore I want a game with a sea theme. It can be mystery or adventure. Thank you very much in advance."

Unfortunitly I forgot about the "Mystery or Adventure" part until I was already ready to upload so... 

There are 14 different fish all of which can be found in the Aegean sea.
